title: Wiki Manager Service (wikimgr)
content_md:
# Wiki Manager Service (wikimgr)

Automates creation and updates of Wiki.js pages.

## Why
- Keep docs in sync from bots/CI
- No manual copy/paste

## What It Does
- Upsert by path + title
- Path rules: lowercase, hyphenate, min-segment length
- Idempotency: header or derived
- Logging with request IDs

## Endpoints
- `GET /healthz`, `GET /readyz`
- `POST /pages/upsert`

## Environment
- WIKIJS_BASE_URL, WIKIJS_API_TOKEN, WIKIJS_LOCALE, WIKIMGR_API_KEY (optional)

## Next
- /metrics
- Redis idempotency cache
- Bulk upsert jobs
